title: Create Encapsulated Student
description:
Create a Student class with:
- private fields: name (String), grade (int)
- constructor
- getName() and getGrade() methods
- setGrade(int g) that only accepts grades 0-100
instructions:
Create a Student class with:
- private fields: name (String), grade (int)
- constructor
- getName() and getGrade() methods
- setGrade(int g) that only accepts grades 0-100

testCases.description:
Student s = new Student("Alice", 85);
return s.getName();

Student s = new Student("Bob", 90);
return s.getGrade();

hints.text: Define a function using the java syntax. Don't forget the return statement if needed.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
